recipes.title: Pasta Primavera
recipes.description: A fresh and healthy pasta dish with vegetables. (updated)
steps: Boil the pasta according to the package instructions.
Sauté the garlic in olive oil until fragrant.
Add the chopped vegetables and cook until tender.
Toss the cooked pasta with the vegetables.
Season with salt, pepper, and a drizzle of olive oil before serving.

recipes.title: Chocolate Cake (edited again)
recipes.description: A rich and moist chocolate cake perfect for dessert.
steps: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix the dry ingredients in a bowl.
Add the wet ingredients and whisk until smooth.
Pour the batter into a greased cake pan.
Bake for 30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: A simple yet delicious breakfast with mashed avocado on toast.
steps: Toast the bread until golden brown.
Mash the avocado and mix with salt
pepper
and lemon juice.
Spread the avocado mixture on the toasted bread.
Top with chili flakes for extra flavor.

recipes.title: Grilled Chicken Salad
recipes.description: A healthy and filling grilled chicken salad with fresh veggies. (updated)
steps: Grill the chicken breast until cooked through.
Chop the vegetables and mix in a large bowl.
Slice the grilled chicken and add it to the salad.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A quick and healthy vegetable stir-fry with soy sauce.(updated)
steps: Chop the vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat sesame oil in a pan and sauté the ginger.
Add the vegetables and stir-fry until tender.
Pour in the soy sauce and cook for another 2-3 minutes.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos (Updated)
recipes.description: A flavorful beef taco recipe with all the fixings.
steps: Brown the ground beef in a pan.
Season with taco seasoning and cook until done.
Warm the taco shells and fill with beef, cheese, lettuce, and tomato.
Top with sour cream and onions.

recipes.title: Pancake
steps: Mix the flour
milk
and eggs to form a batter.
Heat a griddle and pour the batter to form pancakes.
Cook until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with syrup.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad (updated)
recipes.description: A classic Caesar salad with creamy dressing.
steps: Chop the lettuce and toss with croutons and parmesan cheese.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and toss to coat.
Serve immediately.asdasdasd
